mapper.select: SELECT b.m_code, m.m_poster, m.m_title, mh.mh_name, m.m_startdate, m.m_enddate FROM banner b JOIN musical m ON b.m_code = m.m_code JOIN musical_hall mh ON m.mh_code = mh.mh_code

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT m.m_poster, m.m_title, openn.on_open, openn.on_muse_open, openn.on_type, openn.on_code FROM musical m JOIN open_notice openn ON m.m_code = openn.m_code WHERE TO_DATE(openn.on_open, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') >= SYSDATE and m.m_viewstate = 1 ORDER BY openn.on_open ASC, m.m_title ASC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT m.m_poster, m.m_title, mr.mr_title, mr.mr_content, mr.mr_score, u.u_id, m.m_code, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY m.m_title ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE) AS rn FROM musical m JOIN musical_option mo ON m.m_code = mo.m_code JOIN booking b ON mo.mo_code = b.mo_code JOIN users u ON u.u_id = b.u_id JOIN musical_review mr ON b.b_code = mr.b_code WHERE mr.mr_state = 1 ) WHERE rn = 1 AND ROWNUM <= 4

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT m.m_code, m.m_poster, m.m_title, mh.mh_name, m.m_startdate, m.m_enddate, ROWNUM AS rn FROM musical m JOIN musical_hall mh ON m.mh_code = mh.mh_code WHERE m.m_viewstate = 1 ORDER BY m.m_startdate ASC ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{offset} AND #{limit}
